title: My Winny
description: This is a Bluetooth controller for pool cleaning robot. It can control the cleaning robot to automatically clean the pool in 4 modes, or manually control the cleaning robot to clean the designated places in the pool. Also, you can make an appointment to start the cleaning robot automatically and clean the pool.
descriptionHTML: This is a Bluetooth controller for pool cleaning robot. It can control the cleaning robot to automatically clean the pool in 4 modes, or manually control the cleaning robot to clean the designated places in the pool. Also, you can make an appointment to start the cleaning robot automatically and clean the pool.
